intro: Bupleurum caricifolium, commonly known as the broadleaf bupleurum, is a perennial herb native to the mountainous regions of Central Asia. The roots of Bupleurum caricifolium contain various bioactive compounds, making it of interest in traditional and modern herbal medicine.
